p: The ento-epidemiological count data used is of public domain, previously published in other studies, and is here made available (counts per date) in a dedicated subsection of the manuscript. The climatic data was obtained from the United States National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (USOAA) webpage with permission granted by the administration. The climatic data is owned by the USOAA. Access to the data can be granted by USOAA upon request (https://www.research.noaa.gov/Contact).
